summary.purpose: Provides four coloured bus SVG icon generator functions (red, yellow, green, gray) conforming to the VehicleSvg signature for use as map markers and menu icons.
summary.problem_solved: Supplies the bus vehicle type's state-specific icon variants so map and menu components can reflect real-time ignition and speed state visually.

exports.name: redBusIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a red bus SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: yellowBusIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a yellow bus SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: greenBusIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a green bus SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: grayBusIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a gray bus SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

symbols.name: redBusIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a red bus SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: A React SVG element representing a red bus icon. Red indicates ignition is off.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed bus SVG icon in red. Used for buses whose ignition is off (parked/stopped).

minimal_correct.title: Render a red bus icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { redBusIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = redBusIcon('30', '30', '#FF0000', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: yellowBusIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a yellow bus SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: A React SVG element representing a yellow bus icon. Yellow indicates ignition on but not moving.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed bus SVG icon in yellow. Used for buses that are idling (ignition on, speed zero).

minimal_correct.title: Render a yellow bus icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { yellowBusIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = yellowBusIcon('30', '30', '#FF0000', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: greenBusIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a green bus SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: A React SVG element representing a green bus icon. Green indicates the bus is actively moving.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed bus SVG icon in green. Used for buses that are actively moving (speed > 0).

minimal_correct.title: Render a green bus icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { greenBusIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = greenBusIcon('30', '30', '#00FF00', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: grayBusIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a gray bus SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: A React SVG element representing a gray bus icon. Gray indicates telemetry state is unknown.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed bus SVG icon in gray. Used for buses whose telemetry data is unavailable.

minimal_correct.title: Render a gray bus icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { grayBusIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = grayBusIcon('30', '30', '#888888', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');
